title: Review: The Bontrager Girona RSL Gravel Tire Is an Excellent All-Rounder
content:
Bontrager's completely overhauled their gravel tire lineup. Based on our time with the new Girona RSL tire, we'd say their work paid off.

Read the full article at Review: The Bontrager Girona RSL Gravel Tire Is an Excellent All-Rounder on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
